クラス Selection

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Selection

public class Selection
extends greenfoot.Actor

Allows user to click this object to select it. Object is identified by a String.

バージョン:
8/2017 REMEMBER - YOU ARE BEING PROVIDED WITH THIS CLASS. ALTHOUGH YOU ARE WELCOME TO MIDIFY IT, DOING SO IS ****HIGHLY**** INADVISABLE!!!!
作成者:
Stephen Blythe

          Constructor, builds selection box based on the specified String

          look for mouse clicks on this selection box.

コンストラクタの詳細

Selection

public Selection(java.lang.String idLabel)
Constructor, builds selection box based on the specified String

パラメータ:
idLabel - - the String labele for this selection box
メソッドの詳細

act

public void act()
look for mouse clicks on this selection box. When one is found, select this bx and deselect all others. Again, you do NOT need to understand how this code works to use the Selection class!

オーバーライド:
クラス greenfoot.Actor 内の act

addedToWorld

protected void addedToWorld(greenfoot.World w)
オーバーライド:
クラス greenfoot.Actor 内の addedToWorld

getLabel

public java.lang.String getLabel()
returns value of label

戻り値:
- the String value of the label

isSelected

public boolean isSelected()
returns current state of selection box

戻り値:
true, if this selection box is selected; flse if this selection box is not selected
